#2 in Office Furniture Casters
Date First Available March 11, 2016

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $36.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:23:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Original Rollerblade Style Office Chair Wheels, Safe for All Floors.

1 Safe for All Floors 2 Hardwood 3 Carpet 4 Laminate / Vinyl / Tile

Universal Size – Fits 98% of All Office Chairs

These chair casters are the universal size and fit 98% of all office chairs on the market. If they don’t fit your specific chair, no problem, we’ll take care of you.

Quick & Easy Installation

No tools required at all! Simply pull out your old caster wheels and pop in the new ones. Replacing your chair wheels is easy and takes less than 30 seconds.

Our Lifetime Promise to You

Our lifetime promise has no expiration. So if you EVER have any issues with your new chair casters, we’ll send you a brand new set.

The ORIGINAL Rollerblade Style Chair Wheels!

We were the first to introduce rollerblade style wheels for office chair, way back in 2016. Designed in the USA, we continue to evolve and improve these office chair wheels.

The Office Oasis Featured on PBS Show ‘StartUP’

The co-founders of The Office Oasis, Meredith and Kevin, were featured on the PBS show StartUp. They shared their story on how they started a growing e-commerce business with just one simple idea.

★ LIFETIME WARRANTY – Our warranty never expires, so if you EVER have any issues, we’ll send you a brand new set of wheels. There are many cheaper knock offs available, but we’re the only brand that offers and stands behind a full lifetime warranty.
★ SAFE FOR ALL FLOORS – Many chair wheels use cheap, low quality materials that destroy your flooring. We don’t. Encased with soft, polyurethane material our rollerblade style wheels are guaranteed not to scratch or leave marks on any surface (including hardwood, carpet, tile, laminate and more).
★ QUICK AND EASY INSTALLATION – No tools required! Easily remove and replace the wheels in your desk chair in less than 30 seconds. Simply pull out your old caster wheels and pop these in. Check out our quick replacement video for more details.
★ UNIVERSAL SIZE – Upgrade any rolling office chair with these smooth caster wheels. The universal size stem will fit almost every office chair on the market. If for some reason they don’t fit your specific chair, we’ll give you a full refund and even pay the return shipping.
★ SUPPORTS UP TO 650 LBS – Manufactured with the best available materials these casters are built to last a lifetime. Heat treated high-grade steel, precision ball bearings, and durable polyurethane provide years of effortless rolling. The heavy duty chair wheels easily support 650 lbs.

The Office Oasis

Functional, Modern Office Essentials That Look & Feel Good

Previous page

  2. Message from the Brand Owners

    “We want you to be absolutely thrilled with your purchase. So if you ever need anything, just let us know!”

    -Meredith & Kevin

  3. Explore More

    Visit the Store

  4. As Seen on PBS

    Co-Founders Meredith and Kevin share their story on the PBS show Start Up.

  5. Our Story – We’re a small family owned business that started with one simple idea. Rollerblade wheels on office chairs so people everywhere could protect their hardwood floors.

    Our Mission – To create functional office essentials that look & feel good. Because you deserve to work in a space that you love.

    Our Promise – We’ll do everything possible to make sure you are absolutely thrilled with your purchase. No matter what, we are here for you.

Next page

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:18:19 UTC – Details)

Product Description

18 UNITS DOG TOYS FOR PUPPIES AND SMALL DOGS.

Bestdoggo Super Value Toys Pack for Dogs, Help Your Dog Get More Fun, and Protect Your Home.

Dog loves to chew thing, especially puppy, they love to chew around when they feel lonely or teeth growing, give your dog our dog toy, let them play with the toy, not your shoes, clothes, underwear, or furniture.

Dogs love our toy, it’s a great gift for your beloved dogs.

Why do you need our toys?

Building relationship

You can play fetch or hiding game with your dog, it’s a great way to build relationship with your dog, makes your dog loves you more!

Teeth cleaning

No-toxic material rubber toy is a good toy for puppies and small dogs to chew.

Durable and fun to play with

18 pcs durable dog toys, it’s multifarious and colorful, your dog will love our toys.

Easy to wash

Our toys are washable.

18 pcs in one bag, one time purchase with long last.

Quantity
18 Units 7 Units 6 Units 1 Units

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.79 x 9.53 x 3.94 inches; 1.43 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 3, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Bestdoggo
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09V26ML4B

【Safe and High Quality】Great interactive and training toy, you can play fetch and hiding game with your dog, enhance the relationship between you and your dogs.Build energy and health, helps dog solve boredom and anxiety separation, protect furniture from dog chewing.
【Great for Dental Health】Clean teeth, clean your dog’s teeth, make your dog healthier, by chewing the rubber toys and rope toys, dog could get gum massage and stress relief.
【Design for Small Dogs and Puppies】Premium material with built-in squeaker, no glue and non-toxic material, safe and fun, great for puppies.【NOTE!】NOT for aggressive chew dogs, our toys designed for puppies small and medium-sized dog.
【Service from Us】We are so certain that your dog will love these small dog toys. If you have any questions about products, please feel free to contact us, we will always be ready to serve you.
【NOTE!】Please note! These toys set is not suitable for large dogs, aggressive dogs. The toys cannot be eaten. No toy is indestructible. Do not leave toys with unsupervised pets. Remove and replace toy if damaged. At the same time, we suggest that the owner pay attention to the damage of the puppy toy in time.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $16.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

– FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS for Car Guys Plastic Restorer –

QUESTION: Is this only for interior and exterior automotive surfaces? ANSWER: No! This can be used for a variety of applications such as a cars bumper, a jeep or chevy avalanche truck that has tons of plastic, plus your RV or motorcycle! Also has marine applications for things such as the vinyl seats on your boat! Works GREAT for any indoor or outdoor accessories or home restoration projects such as shutters, furniture and siding. Looks like just an auto product, but this special formula will bring ANYTHING made from plastic, vinyl or rubber back to life!

QUESTION: Is this a dye and is it only for black material? ANSWER: No this is not a dye! It will restore the material back to whatever its original color was. Works excellent to bring black back and if you have faded grey trim it will darken it back to its original shine and finish.

QUESTION: Does this contain UV protection? ANSWER: Yes! This acts like a sealant by leaving a durable UV protectant guard to shield away harmful UV rays that cause fading, browning and cracking.

QUESTION: What kind of prep work or after care is involved, is it easy to use? ANSWER: This product is extremely easy to use! Simply clean the surface using CarGuys Super Cleaner spray or any other type of cleaner that effectively wipes and cleans off any old dressings, oil and dirt. Apply a small amount onto our kits included applicator pad and wipe onto the surface. After 10-15 minutes buff down any excess product and you’re done! In the future, simply clean treated surfaces with regular soap and water.

[[ Complete Kit Includes: (1) Foam Applicator Pad. ]]

Description
Safe & Effective Multi-Surface Cleaner Restore anything made from Plastic, Rubber, or Vinyl Acid Free & pH Balanced Wheel and Tire Cleaner Easy to use, no sling Tire Shine Spray Sealant infused with Carnauba Wax High Gloss Synthetic Paint Sealant

No Harmful Chemicals

CarGuys’ Commitment to Safety

At CarGuys, we care about traffic safety. Through our sponsorship of We Save Lives, we have the opportunity to ensure the safety of others by increasing awareness of highway safety issues and to influence highway safety policy at the local, state and national levels. We are committed to helping We Save Lives change attitudes about drunk, drugged and distracted driving and promote responsible driving that saves lives.

Results That Last! – Are you tired of wasting time and money on plastic restorers that claim to last long? They always look great in the beginning.. only to fade after a few days, or maybe a month if it’s decent! Our product will renew, seal and protect any interior/exterior surface and WILL LAST.. for several MONTHS! Stop purchasing cheap junk with false claims, our product will out last all of them!
Survives Rain! – Does this sound familiar? You spent all that time perfectly applying a new product and it looks great! Wow, you finally found the one! BUT… after the first rain-fall you look in disgust at yet another crappy product that left ugly streaks down the side of your beautiful vehicle… STOP THE MADNESS! Our product repels water and stays looking good for several months! Never again will you feel that disappointment!
No More Oily Mess! – Do you hate all the oily, greasy gel dressing products that stay wet and never fully dry? That describes about 90% of the plastic and trim restorers on the market today! Well lucky you! We made a product that will restore and leave a great finish, but more importantly, it will completely dry to the touch! No more ruining your detailing towels and supplies with cheap oil based products!
Why choose CAR GUYS? – We Care About Quality! Our products are made with the latest advancements in science, using the best equipment available. This helps us make consistently high quality products that always work great! Every formula we make is mixed and bottled, in the USA, by hard working Americans!
We Care About Customer Satisfaction! – We’re Not Happy, If You’re Not Happy! If you’re not happy with our product, for ANY REASON at all, get in contact with CAR GUYS anytime after your purchase, and we’ll be happy to provide a full refund. So what are you waiting for?! — Click ‘Add to Cart’ Now!

– FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS for Car Guys Plastic Restorer –

QUESTION: Is this only for interior and exterior automotive surfaces? ANSWER: No! This can be used for a variety of applications such as a cars bumper, a jeep or chevy avalanche truck that has tons of plastic, plus your RV or motorcycle! Also has marine applications for things such as the vinyl seats on your boat! Works GREAT for any indoor or outdoor accessories or home restoration projects such as shutters, furniture and siding. Looks like just an auto product, but this special formula will bring ANYTHING made from plastic, vinyl or rubber back to life!

QUESTION: Is this a dye and is it only for black material? ANSWER: No this is not a dye! It will restore the material back to whatever its original color was. Works excellent to bring black back and if you have faded grey trim it will darken it back to its original shine and finish.

QUESTION: Does this contain UV protection? ANSWER: Yes! This acts like a sealant by leaving a durable UV protectant guard to shield away harmful UV rays that cause fading, browning and cracking.

QUESTION: What kind of prep work or after care is involved, is it easy to use? ANSWER: This product is extremely easy to use! Simply clean the surface using CarGuys Super Cleaner spray or any other type of cleaner that effectively wipes and cleans off any old dressings, oil and dirt. Apply a small amount onto our kits included applicator pad and wipe onto the surface. After 10-15 minutes buff down any excess product and you’re done! In the future, simply clean treated surfaces with regular soap and water.

[[ Complete Kit Includes: (1) Foam Applicator Pad. ]]

Price: $39.90 - $33.14
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:38 UTC – Details)


Caterpillar ToughRide Heavy-Duty 4 Piece Rubber Floor Mats For Car Truck Van SUV, Black – Premium Trim to Fit Car Floor Mats, All Weather Deep Dish Automotive Floor Mats, Total Dirt Protection.
Shape and Size is Engineered to Fit Most Cars, Trucks, Vans and SUVs. Made to be trimmable to fit your vehicle’s floor contours with only a pair of Scissors. No more having to strain your back from stuffing your mats just to get them to fit. Simply cut through the lines until you find the perfect fitment. Measurements: Front: 26″ x 20″ inch Rear: 20″ x 19″ inch
Trimmable to Fit Certain Trims of the following Vehicles – F-150; Silverado; Ram; RAV4; CRV; Accord; Prius; Wrangler; Pilot; Sentra; Traverse; Tucson; Escape; Outback; CX-5; Forester; Cherokee; Explorer; Equinox; Sierra; Tacoma; Highlander; Civic; Corolla; Camry; Rogue
Maximum Weather Protection – Protect your vehicle’s flooring by catching spills, stains, dirt and debris that other floor mats can miss. These mats are durable and long lasting and will withstand normal wear and tear.
Waterproof – The uniquely constructed linear and diagonal ridges are placed strategically within the deep dish of these mats to maximize its trapping capabilities. Water, snow, mud and debris are contained and will not escape or leak through into the vehicle’s interior.
No-Slip Grip – Rubberized nibs on the bottom so the mat always stays in place – Ergonomic grooves on top to give your foot more traction & comfort.

Read more

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description UPDATE MATERIAL: 100% natural rubber and is non-toxic, durable enough for dog chewing. Great for interactive indoor and outdoor play. WANT TO EXTEND THE PLAYTIME? Be sure to entice with a dash of peanut butter or similar paste-like food in the grooves, dogs will never stop obsessed with ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.98 - $20.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:13 UTC – Details)

Product Description

UPDATE MATERIAL: 100% natural rubber and is non-toxic, durable enough for dog chewing.

Great for interactive indoor and outdoor play.

WANT TO EXTEND THE PLAYTIME?

Be sure to entice with a dash of peanut butter or similar paste-like food in the grooves, dogs will never stop obsessed with it.

HIGH DENSITY RING DOG TOY

with sufficient toughness was born to chew

Built for long-lasting engagement and promotes your dog’s strong jaws. discouraging destructive chewing, combat boredom and relieve anxiety or frustration. Soft and bouncy material keeps it never hurt puppy’s mouth or teeth when chewing.

Help your dog spend his boundless reserves of energy with the ring dog chew toy. This long-lasting chew toy will provide hours of playtime for you and your furry friend.

WHY DOGS NEED IT?

THICK RIM STANDS UP TO TOUGH CHEWING LAYERED TEXTURES BUILT FOR LONG-LASTING ENGAGEMENT AND ENTERTAINED FOR HOURS NUBS DESIGN TO REDUCE PLAQUE AND TARTAR HELP SATISFY DOG’S INSTINCTUAL NEEDS AND PROVIDES MENTAL STIMULATION.

All-STAR OF DOG TOYS VALUE SET OF 14!

Puppies explore the world by chewing, various types available for 2-3 toys timely change, that’s help puppies to stay curious, develop intelligence. JUST BUY ONE, get the combination of dog teething toys, chew toys, rope toys and interactive toys, every part of our dog toy pack is necessary, cooperate to keep dog happy chewing. The most valuable team works better for the dog’s healthy growth.

JUST CLICK IT, you can get all you need here.

Chewing is a great way for dogs to communicate, encourage it without being destructive helps to keep dog’s right chewing behavior from an early age. Rubber ring toy has a long-lasting, high bouncy, by chewing it, satisfy dogs’ instincts and relief the stress caused by boredom or anxiety. Want to extend playtime? Be sure to entice with a dash of peanut butter in the grooves.

4 adorable chew toys are specially designed for teething puppies and small dogs, including one heart-shaped toy, one star-shaped toy, one key-like toy and one biscuit-like toy, Teething puppies have strong chewing desire out of the pain from gum soreness, inflammation and teeth shooting. Chewing our soft and flexible rubber toys will help massage gums and relieve stress, which is good for teething in return.

Cotton rope dog toys are classical type, great for tug of war games. Your doggie will have a fun time while keeping your home tidy and clean. Also act as teeth floss, deeply clean the hidden germs.

High bouncy dog ball toy is great dog training toys, benefit your furry friends. They running, jumping to get the toys, that training dogs’ reaction and leaping ability, positively enhance the relationship between you and your dogs.

2 plush dog squeaky toys feature a inner squeaker, not too loud but still get the dog’s attention.

we recommend supervised play, timely replacement of the broken ones.

Thick ring dog toy was born to chew, available for long-lasting engagement, vent energy out and ease stress. 4 different shape rubber toys with hand-knotted rope are soft enough and bouncy, chewing to relieve sore & itchy teething issues. Whether at home or outdoors, rope toys with handles are perfect for dog to play with you or their friends. Using them as a puppy tooth floss cleaning toys, keep dental hygiene. Women’s Waterproof Rain Boots Men’s Waterproof Rain Boots What problem are we solving? ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $54.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:11:02 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About HISEA:

HISEA is a company specializing in the production of outdoor wear. In order to produce perfect outdoor products, HISEA strives to make every detail of each product take into account your needs.

Women’s Waterproof Rain Boots

Men’s Waterproof Rain Boots

What problem are we solving?

We are a global brand. Our mission and purpose that guides us in everything we do is to resolve the problem of people’s necessities for work and life, defense against outdoor elements, inspire the dream of a better life for you.

What makes our products unique?

Our products are versatile and functional, easy to take care of. All kinds of products are ranged from men, women to children.

HISEA pre sales & after sales servie?

We love our customers; we provide 24h free contact service and a lifetime quality response of our products.

HISEA Rubber Rain Boots

100% WaterproofInsulatedFlexible

Women’s EVA Hunting boots

Men’s Rubber Rain Boots

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.94 x 12.71 x 4.8 inches; 2.8 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ OneStone
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08B5S8RSS

HISEA women’s garden boots give outdoors lovers all the lightweight performance and 100% waterproof protection. They are designed to be one of the most VERSATILE STYLES, an ideal for where there is mud, slush or rain.
These women’s gardening boots provide 100% Waterproof. 5mm four-way stretch nylon flex-foam boots and high-grade rubber overlays keep feet dry and warm, and providing comfort and support for long time standing.
Lightweight, breathable 2mm H-Airmesh lining allows the air to travel throughout the boots, which keeps your feet much dryer than normal boots. The air mesh is what keeps high-end running shoes cool and dry under intense use. Comfort rated from subfreezing temperatures to 86 °F/30 °C. Best for year-round use.
Roll them down to let inner delicate floral printing outside, they become shoes immediately! These superior boots offer all day comfort wherever you go, they are features an aggressive non-slip sole, shedding debris easily. A removable molded EVA sock liner and reinforced rubber shell provide additional protection to achilles, heel and toe.
PLEASE MIND THE SIZE CHART AND CHOOSE THE RIGHT SIZE BEFORE BUYING! We love our buyers; Boots come with a FREE gift. One Year Quality Assurance Backed By HISEA!

Read more

Breathable air-mesh lining allows air to travel throughout the boots.

Durable rubber layers for additional protection to heel and toe.

Roll them down to let inner delicate floral outside.

5 mm neoprene upper keeps you warm & comfortable.

Read more

100% waterproof, lightweight and flexible.

Non-slip durable molded rubber outsoles.

Sealed rubber shell extends up above ankle.

Year-round use; Best for muck mud working, gardening, fishing, hiking, riding and farming.

item.dc:creator: admin

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.72 x 4.72 x 4.72 inches; 3.49 Ounces Item model number ‏ ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $128.13
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:17:49 UTC – Details)


The classic Orient diver has been upgraded in several areas, including the debut of the new Orient caliber F6922 and a more robust 120-Click bezel.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.72 x 4.72 x 4.72 inches; 3.49 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ FAA02007B9
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 18, 2016
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Orient
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01AK5TQNG

Mineral crystal
120-Click unidirectional bezel
Japanese-automatic Movement
Case Diameter : 41.5mm without crown; Case Thickness : 13mm
Water Resistant 200m (660ft): in General, Suitable for Professional Marine Activity and Serious Surface Water Sports, but not Diving

About the Brand

– Manufactured and developed mechanical watches for over 65 years.

– One of the top 3 mechanical watch manufacturers in Japan.

– All movements (the timing device) are made in Japan.

– Producing our own movements ensures the highest quality and speaks to Orient’s true passion, watchmaking.

The Orient Movement

– Reputation for robust and trustworthy performance.

– Known to be reliable and accurate, right out of the box.

– Features a smooth sweeping second hand.

– Powered by your own body movement and never needs a battery.

The Ray II

The new Ray II is the improved version of our best seller, the Ray. Features of the Ray II include:

– Upgraded movement, caliber F6922.

– New hand-winding capability.

– Stop seconds feature to sync time with ease.

– 120-click unidirectional diving bezel, for improved precision.

– Exceptional luminescence for visibility in low light situations.

Read more

(as of Nov 29,2022 04:17:49 UTC – Details)

Amazon Basics Rubber Encased Hex Dumbbell Hand Weight
Dumbbell hand weight for exercise and strength training; ideal for use in fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
Includes a single 20 pound dumbbell with a solid cast iron core
Non-slip textural surface for a secure grip
Hexagonal black rubber-encased ends prevent rolling and promote stay-in-place storage
Product dimensions: 12.1 x 4.9 x 4.3 inches (LxWxH) with 1.4-inch grip diameter

Amazon Basics Rubber Encased Hex Hand Dumbbell Weight

Rubber-Encased Hex Dumbbell

Bring strength and resistance training into your workouts with this rubber-encased hex dumbbell. Multiple weights available to suit your needs.

Solid Cast-Iron Core

The weight features a solid cast-iron core for high-quality strength and reliable stability from one workout to the next.

Comfort-Grip Handle

The dumbbell’s contoured, textured chrome handle helps ensure a secure, comfortable grip for lifting and training.

Hexagon Shape

The hexagon-shaped rubber-encased ends help ensure safe, secure placement and easy access—no rolling away to worry about.
